page.title: 01WHITCHURCH PROFILE
page.content: {The population}of Whitchurch is about 7100.They do jobs such as shopkeepers, engineers,dairy workers,office and hotel workers.Many women work in the new supermarkets.Not everybody has a job,about one tenth are unemployed. {The Romans}came to Whitchurch in 1st cent.A.D.calling it Mediolanum as it was a convenient place to camp between Deva (Chester)and Uriconium(Wroxeter). {The library}lets you borrow books instead of buying them.There is a Police station and five Schools including the White House private school. There is a Job Centre to find people jobs. {There is a youth club}called Centre North East where they have something different every night.We can go swimming at the local swimming baths.
